description.oldValue:
When making or receiving a PSTN call, location-based routing for Teams on VDI, enables the bypass of toll restrictions based on where the user is located. Such as when the user is not physically located on a corporate network.
GA date: April CY2023
description.newValue:
When making or receiving a PSTN call,
location-based routing for Teams on VDI, enables the bypass of toll
restrictions based on where the user is located. Such as when the user is not
physically located on a corporate network.
